welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Spencer, where charm meets adventure! Get ready to experience the small-town feel and explore our beautiful parks, historic downtown, and friendly community. We can't wait for you to discover all that our city is known for and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers domestic and international flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
